descriptions.en: Supposedly, the regrets of a tea ceremony master who died before perfecting his craft lingered in some matcha and became a Pokémon.
descriptions.es: Supposedly, the regrets of a tea ceremony master who died before perfecting his craft lingered in some matcha and became a Pokémon.
descriptions.ca: Segons es diu, els penediments d'un mestre de la cerimònia del te que va morir abans de perfeccionar la seva habilitat es van quedar impregnats en una mica de matxa i es van convertir en un Pokémon.
